ej,ecked001,P,scotd901,Balls and strikes ej,larut101,M,scotd901,Balls and strikes ej,duncd101,C,scotd901,Balls and strikes ej,neelt001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,nunee001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,reynt101,C,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,folit001,C,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,garnp001,M,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,thond001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,mcgwm001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl Dennis Eckersley, Athletics manager Tony LaRussa and Athletics coach Dave Duncan ejected by HP umpire Dale Scott arguing balls and strikes; LaRussa refused to leave the field and the umpires did little to get him off; Brewers manager Phil Garner came out to complain about the delay (it was after midnight) and LaRussa confronted Garner; both benches emptied and a brawl started when Troy Neel made a flying tackle of Dickie Thon; that tackle also knocked down Dave Nilsson; Athletics coach Tommie Reynolds and Brewers coach Tim Foli threw punches at each other; both managers and Mike Aldrete restrained B.J. Surhoff but Edwin Nunez felled Surhoff with a punch; that blow drew blood around Surhoff's mouth; the following people were ejected by 1B umpire (and crew chief) Dave Phillips: Neel, Nunez, Thon, Reynolds, Garner, Foli and Mark McGwire; the ejections forced some unusual substitutions: Rickey Bones (who was the Brewers starting pitcher in game 1) played RF
